mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Square Dance Date Book", "From the Floor", "As I See It, by Bob Osgood", "Indoctrination Handbook: Section III", "What Are They Dancing?", "Americana: The Dreary Black Hills by Terry Golden", "The Dancer's Walkthru", "Overseas Dateline: A Look at Square Dancing in Denmark", "Style Series: Terry Lynn's Jig", "What They Were Wearing Then and What They Are Wearing Now", "'Round the Outside Ring", "Workshop", "Special Handbook Series: The Record Square Dance Party", "The Voice of the Caller", "The Caller of the Month: Johnny Schultz", "Paging the Roundancers: Lou and Ginger Brown", "On the Record and Record Report", and "Experimental Lab".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
